website_summaries.verdict: The Anker Zolo Liberty do just enough for the price to make them recommendable totally wireless earphones.
pros: The Zolo Liberty are totally wireless earphones that offer decent sound for their price
They're sweatproof and include a charging case that delivers as much battery life as the AirPods' charging case
cons: Aside from the decent price, they're otherwise pretty generic

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but make sure you get the right fit
customer_reviews.text: These have awesome sound, and the case makes the battery life quite long. However, make sure you get the right fit. I have these for a couple weeks, and they kept falling out. So I switched to the smallest ear tips, and they kept in my ear. Then, I noticed they would still wiggle out just enough to muffle the sound. So I then switched from the standard rubber skin to the smallest ear wing skin. After these 2 changes, these now sound and fit perfect. Nice and snug, great sound and base, and they create a great seal, so I hardly hear anything else around me (which is what I want).
customer_reviews.author: Jess Lira

customer_reviews.title: These have worked great for me so far (~2 months)
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great for me so far (~2 months)! No issues with connectivity, can leave my phone in my gym bag in the cubby and be lifting weights 20 feet away and have no issues. I run in them too, and they stay put. Make sure to try out the different sizes of ear buds and stabilizer thingies, it really makes a difference in the fit and security in your ear. Found out one of my ears is totally shaped differently than the other - once I figure that out and changed the ear bud sizes for that one ear, they are super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna E.

customer_reviews.title: The headphones seem like a good idea that just couldn't deliver
customer_reviews.text: The headphones seem like a good idea that just couldn't deliver. I had these for about a week. The left earpiece all of a sudden stops working after about 4 days of usage. Part of me is upset that I ave to give them 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Low Call Quality after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend searching into other options, such as airpods or the Google earbuds, before buying these. Overall they work okay, at best. Everything seemed fine at first, but call quality quickly dropped after a month of casual use. Now when I make calls using the earphone, the other person can hardly hear me. For just listening to music, these were ok. Even after trying the different sized earbud things, they do become loose in my ear pretty frequently. Additionally, pairing it so I could use both earbuds at the same time for audio was very difficult (and I'm pretty tech savvy) and it still sometimes doesn't work. Overall they're OK, but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Useless right out of box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in beginning of June right out of the box only the right earbud will work no matter what I connect them too. The one earbud sounds decent but I could've just purchased a single earbud for that purpose and saved some money too, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great features but get the plus
customer_reviews.text: I went through two new pairs with Anker support and internet forums suggesting various fixes. None worked. The headphones disconnect frequently from each other, anywhere from 30s to 5min. It isn't distance from your phone, since the controller (right earbud) keeps playing. It's simply the connection between the earbuds. Update: Zolo has gone out of their way to send me the updated pair, the Liberty+ using BT 5.0. The new pair works great.
customer_reviews.author: pmow

customer_reviews.title: Update: So awesome, bought another AND a Liberty+!
customer_reviews.text: Saw some reviews mentioning the left ear "dropping out" and experienced it myself. I REALLY trust Anker, so I kept using them and the problem went away. (4 hours straight last Friday, no issues whatsoever!) bought a pair for my girlfriend, and a new pair of the Liberty+ for me, since my phone supports Bluetooth 5.0 and I'm EXTREMELY happy with both models. Will recommend to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Torgersen (R1-Squirrel)

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Will stop holding charge after short time.
customer_reviews.text: First online review of my life. Do not buy these. Like others have noted, this will be the last kickstarter product I purchase. Left earbud stopped charging. Extremely disappointing and regret making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Waterfield

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is a total joke and never held up to the specified 3.5 hours. I was lucky to get 1.5 hours out of a charge. Constantly disconnected from device and issues with the left and right earbuds not connecting together. Update: Anker reached out after my review and sent me a replacement set of earphones and it had the exact same problem. Great customer service, but faulty product. +1 star for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Maike

customer_reviews.title: Units failed to charge
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these earphones. The sound was good, the fit was comfortable, and the pairing was relatively straightforward (with only one button on each side, it took a little bit of getting used to. However, within a couple weeks, the earphones would not take a charge from the charging case. I tried draining the batteries and recharging, troubleshooting, contacting the company, etc. because I thought I had found the perfect pair, but after reading more reviews online, it seems others have had similar problems. Hopefully the issue was just a defective unit, but I had to return them and will continue to see if Anker can fix the issue moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: golfcat87

customer_reviews.title: they sound like an AM radio
customer_reviews.text: I own the sports buds and was so looking forward to these, but besides that they have no physical controls over volume or track, if you can't fit them in your ears in exactly the right way, they sound like an AM radio. A shame ...
customer_reviews.author: C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Bad audio lag when watching video!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is excellent, but when watching YouTube, Netflix, or other videos there is a definite audio lag that is VERY noticeable. Maybe this will be resolved with the Liberty + version with its Bluetooth 5.0 built in but we are not paying $100 to have an off lip-sync pair of earphones!
customer_reviews.author: Nerd_Baller

customer_reviews.title: Truly wireless Bluetooth ear buds that sound great for their size
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. I was worried they would be loose in my ear, but when you twist them into your ear they feel nice and snug — no worries about them falling out with normal use. The sound quality is good for their size. My noise cancelling over-the-head Sony headphones create deeper tones than the ZOLO, but I don’t expect a small wireless ear bud to sound as good as larger headphones.
customer_reviews.author: southm98

customer_reviews.title: Dropped it in water
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected it to be! Instructions are clear (fully charge it before using). Sound was crisp. So satisfied with this product. Thank you Zolo!! PS - I accidentally dropped the left bud in the water. I then checked the sound quality and connectivity. No issues at all. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: ejabelleza

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts for hours
customer_reviews.text: I use these to listen to audio books and answer phone calls. Works well for both. I can listen to books for hours before the charge runs out once. Then I just place them back in their box, I do NOT need to plug it in (very convenient) and it recharges. Only have to plug in the charging box once every few weeks, despite using these daily for hours. Great for busy people. Small charging carrying case even fits in a tiny purse.
customer_reviews.author: Motek Fourtytwo

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones with some small things that could be better
customer_reviews.text: Pretty true to what it was described but since the headphones are so heavy if you have them in for more than 1 hour my ears start to hurt but with that being said i absolutely love the sound and the headphone overall but now i’m at the point where i’ve had them for about 4-5 months and the right headphone has become more quiet and faint then the other head phone also since the right head phone is the main receiver if you want to have one head phone in and one out it’s gonna have to be the right and that sucks when the right headphone is so much more quiet than the left, but overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Tran

customer_reviews.title: The headphones work great. I had some issues after 6 months of ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones work great. I had some issues after 6 months of use and the customer support was great and helped resolve the issue hassle free. I had always heard great reviews of the Anker Customer support but never had a reason to use them. Between the quality of the headphones and the great customer service I will continue to buy Anker products. More on the headphones, I have these and another pair of completely wire free headphones that were over $150. I personally like these more and feel that they have better battery life and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fieldhouse

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for first 2 months but now sound quality very poor
customer_reviews.text: I loved them so much when I first received them. The sound quality was incredible. I thought I had finally found my wireless headphones. Now I can barely hear anything from them after a few runs. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: vanessaj

customer_reviews.title: these sound better and the lack of umbilical cord is a big ...
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Soundpeats Qy7, these sound better and the lack of umbilical cord is a big plus. They also fit and stay in better. Obviously apples-to-oranges considering the big price difference, but that's what I had before and I have not tried the Airpods or anything else. I've noticed the issue with the left earpiece cutting out momentarily, but only very occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Great for what it is. Although, I had constant connection drops when at the gym. For this reason I couldn't keep using it. Will see if it's bluetooth .5 version will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Airpods
customer_reviews.text: I often work nights in a warehouse and these are great sounding headphones that don’t get in the way of my work. Battery life is exceptional and the charging case works quickly. I have tried AirPods before but did not find them comfortable for use longer than half an hour. The interchangeable ear inserts as well as the outer ear hook customization made it super easy to make these headphones stay in and stay comfortable. The sound quality is nothing to write home about, but for true wireless headphones I can’t complain. These work great at lower volumes so you can still hear what’s going on around you.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great fit right out of the case for me and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit right out of the case for me and more importantly the most comfortable in-ear headphones I've used to date. I love the battery life on this. Stop listening, put in case, then fully charged for the next time I use them. I'm happy with the audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Halfway to Greatness but not quite.
customer_reviews.text: Was a great experience at the start, they fit so well, packaging was fantastic, charge case was sturdy. I really never wanted to take them out because they molded so well to my ear. After a few house use the left ear bud continuously cut out at random intervals.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Castro

customer_reviews.title: setup was easy and these never fall out when doing cardio
customer_reviews.text: my go to gym headphones.... had a pair of jaybird x2s for over 2 years.... but my dog ate them... setup was easy and these never fall out when doing cardio, deadlifting or pullups
customer_reviews.author: mikeymontz

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fit.  Best wireless earbuds yet!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every brand of wireless earbuds over the last year and they all have tons of problems. The Zolo Liberty are hands down the best of the bunch. The sound quailty is amazing, the fit is great, and I love that the case doubles as a charger. I can’t believe they sound better than the $349 Bragi Dash Pro and they are only $99. The only thing lacking here is audio transparency. I will definitely being upgrading to the Liberty+ when they come out, as they will gain that feature. Definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Tried all the various size earpieces. Devices fall out of ears repeatedly. Lost one of them first week. Unreliable investment. Go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: joseph wall

customer_reviews.title: solid product.
customer_reviews.text: I am revising my review as it seems that a bluetooth patch on my phone has fix the connectivity issues I have had with these. The battery life has been solid, the sound quality has been good, and the microphone is good for when I am on the move.
customer_reviews.author: tidi0x

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I really like these earbuds the only issue is that they will momentarily cut out on occasion. The range is decent and they seem to hold up well to sweat.
customer_reviews.author: zLudtke

customer_reviews.title: People just return and return until someone keeps the garbage. So close to blacklisting amazon
customer_reviews.text: Took a mother fing hammer to these earlier tonight. Another returned amazon piece of shit that doesn't work at all. It's own app doesn't detect the device, you have to mess around with it to connect, the left sound keeps dropping out, then the right keeps skipping., What a pair of utter trash, i am so fing ticked off. People just return and return until someone keeps the garbage. So close to blacklisting amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for almost everything and I’ve only had them for a month and the left one already doesn’t work and they’re taking forever to charge now. Definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only answer phone in one ear music plays out of both
customer_reviews.author: wilbert

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sound is awesome. Bluetooth-to-phone sound very good. Main issue is that the microphone is ONLY on the right earpiece. If you prefer to use the left earpiece for phone - your out of luck. Wish I had realized there was a $20.00 off check box. I feel I paid too much now. =(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but sometimes they disconnect
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal customer from Anker, and I would go with them before going with any other brand. I decided to go with this Zolo Liberty earbuds before buying other brand, and honestly they are pretty good but I have been having issues with them. For some reason, one of the earbuds sometimes does not connect to my devices. Also, in many situations, they randomly disconnect. The sound quality is great, but those issues that I mentioned made me give a 3 star rating. I was thinking about buying the liberty plus depending on my experience on these ones, but I think that I might change my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these been running with them for a year. No problems. Stay put and sound good. Lots of sweat and they keep working
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Delay between about audio and video
customer_reviews.text: I've had the product for several weeks now and my feelings are mixed. In terms of everyday use, walking around or working out these headphones perform well. Audio quality is solid. Battery life seems stable, every so often they shut off for a second randomly. My big issue is the delay between audio and video. My audio is always a good second or 2 behind my video no matter if I'm on my phone, desktop, or a laptop. If this could be fixed or improved, I'd think much more of the product.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome headphones. I was looking for some that were wireless and I knew that I had great luck with Anker products in the past, so I gave these a shot. Sound quality is excellent to me (I’m no audiophile though, just an average listener). The look of the ear buds and case is very nice. They function flawlessly as well. I would recommend these headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good sounding earbuds but Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Really good sounding earbuds and stays in the ears securely. Love working out with this. Started having connectivity issues on the right earbud about 8 months into it. And now it no longer turn on. I love these earbuds, and to pay $100 for it, I expect this to last. Really disappointed. I can't be replacing my earbuds every year at $100 or more, which is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Thian P Chong

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, fair performance
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was buying so I did not have unrealistic expectations. Bluetooth headphones are going to have less fidelity than wired, almost every time. But they are under $100, charge quickly, charge lasts and connect easily. I will say though, that when you have them in, it is hard to hear voices/sounds even when not listening to anything. Overall, I am fine with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blake M Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life with case
customer_reviews.text: Sound is ok. Left earbud sometimes loses connection and have to switch off/on a couple of times to get it connected again. Great battery life with case. Not so comfortable in the ears. Update - Anker reached out to me after my review. They sent me a new pair and no connection issue so far. Thumps up Anker for being proactive and taking care of your customers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Leung

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but an uncomfortable on my left ear
customer_reviews.text: my ears are shaped differently so my left ear has some pain after extended uses while my right ear doesn't, this is not the product's fault. One thing about the earphones is that if I cover my ear the sound will cut off and sometimes even disconnect the 2 earphones. The sound quality is really good for these kinds of buds and it is much better than the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Dat G.

customer_reviews.title: Connection quality and latency destroys listening experience
customer_reviews.text: After using these for months now, one of the two buds frequently goes in and out creating an annoying listening experience. On top of that using them to watch videos is worthless, the huge latency issue cause the audio to be at least a second behind the video
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother! Earphones will change volume randomly.
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable. Sound will come and go in each earphone regardless of volume control or the number of resets you do.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Thought they were good....
customer_reviews.text: Until just before a year into using them the sound (not function) stopped working on one of them. Spoke to zolo and they didn't do anything to rectify, soooo....dont buy!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with one of the buds not pairing or responding, submitted a request to their support team and they were awesome. They had me test them to make sure it wasn't user error and sent me a new pair once they figured out the issue. Great personal treatment from support, very satisfied. (the buds are pretty great too, btw).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound, easy to set up, great for phone calls. However, the left earbud dies consistently and the volume isn't quite loud enough for me. Don't bother trying to reach the manufacturer, they're worthless. Returning and will wait for a better pair to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: not like other else even higher price
customer_reviews.text: not only for music. I expected this for enjoying movie and youtube. even youtube, yes it has delay a little bit, but very acceptable. not like other else even higher price. also paring is easy, simple, and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less than 1 year of usage they stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for less than a year. At first I loved them. But now they will not both work at the same time and whichever one is working you can barely hear. Guess I will have to spend another $200 and try some bone induction wireless ear buds. I have used the zolo some but not excessively.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny bailey

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Initially started OK, but rapidly started losing volume in the right side. Now both earpods have very low volume and I can barely hear sound. Unnacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: NavyDoc

customer_reviews.title: I love Anker but not this
customer_reviews.text: I love Anker products but I am very sad with this product. I bought this originally in January, by May the right ear piece stopped putting out sound. I talked to them and they were very nice and sent me a new set. Well it’s Dec and the right ear piece is doing it again.
customer_reviews.author: jonathon burson

customer_reviews.title: Zolo > airpods
customer_reviews.text: The Perfect answer to air pods. They fit even better and are water resistant. I never expected them to be so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple of months we did have a problem with the right ear bud.....sound was very muted. We contacted Anker about it and I have to say I have never experienced better customer service. We were given a couple of troubleshooting options and when those did not work, Anker issued a return label for the buds. Once we notified them that we had sent them out, Anker released a new pair to us....we received them the next day. Everything is working great with the new set. Our customer service reps name is Joy, and she was certainly a joy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Pairing it can take awhile
customer_reviews.text: The pairing can be a hit and miss sometimes. Other than that, these are pretty good earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Vinhcl55

customer_reviews.title: Can't auto turn on/off after two months
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good until it stop auto turn off when you put them in case, just two months, can't find any solution s
customer_reviews.author: Chengxu Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: They are my husband's and he is hard of hearing but enjoys these
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, convenient form factor
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to use any other ear buds. Works great for phone conversations. Quick response from Anker customer service about cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great potential, disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: The left headphone stopped working after 4 months of use, the fit was good but the quality of these headphones leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier R

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for those who love Music.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself for Christmas and I love it. Sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: These sounded great, felt good in ear. Not bad for price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Not completely satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: The right ear unit sometimes overheats and almost burns my ear. I sometimes have trouble getting them to come on when I first pull them out to use them. Plus it only lasts about 4 hours before I have to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: jcmogal

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Exactly what I was looking for. They fit perfectly in my ear. They don’t fall out. Sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: lara

customer_reviews.title: Huge case, great sound, base and volume.
customer_reviews.text: These where nearly perfect but the fack they have such a huge case didn't work for me or I would have kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Right Ear Piece Went Dead
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a while and then the right ear piece went dead. I tried all the troubleshooting but to no avail. Bummer as this was a nice find.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morin

customer_reviews.title: Company doesn't respond to you at all
customer_reviews.text: Left ear bud stopped working after a month or so. Tried everything to try to fix the issue and nothing. I have written them 3 times in about 2 weeks. I haven't received anything from the company. Wouldn't recommend this to anyone at this moment.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Sound quality is PERFECT! Fit is so comfortable (most earbuds don’t stay in my ears). They never move no matter how hard I shake my head! So happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sue Karp

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud doesn’t work on most models
customer_reviews.text: Right earbud kept disconnecting frequently (like, once every five minutes). Right earbud finally died, contacted the company who admitted it was an issue that several customers had been experiencing but since my warranty had just expired days earlier, they wouldn’t replace it. Not buying these in the future, there are cheaper/better sounding options out there.
customer_reviews.author: jhospodor

customer_reviews.title: Great upcoming product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality in both the build and audio clarity. The initial unboxing was great and came with plenty of accessories such as changeable covers and ear tips. I would highly reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton

customer_reviews.title: They were great for 3 months (fit comfortably
customer_reviews.text: They were great for 3 months (fit comfortably, decent sound, good connection, good battery life, convenient charging case) then the left pod stopped working. I read similar complaints and tried a few things but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ericson M Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Awesome for listening to music at work and ...
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Awesome for listening to music at work and doing yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Incredible design! These earbuds are amazing. Only issue I have is the one-second delay between the phone audio and the buds. Charging is awesome! Great battery life for the price! Great for workouts and running.
customer_reviews.author: HunterBlackstone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After I understand how to use a part looks like cat ear, earphones get stable on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Hiro

customer_reviews.title: Great company and good service. They stand behind there product
customer_reviews.text: These are good till you lose the ear piece with the pairing capability. Update : Anker has sent me a replacement unit to replace the lost ear piece. And every is back to being great.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, a must for riding the LIRR. They stay charged for a long time. Easily pairs with IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: michael m.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great they last forever on battery and sound decent all for a decent price would definetly recomend this.
customer_reviews.author: Drew jones

customer_reviews.title: Help me Anker
customer_reviews.text: I received these earbuds on June 9 2018. Worked great for 2 weeks. Now have all kinds of problems. Help Anker
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these headphones amazing but customer service goes above and beyond for the consumer. Never have experienced anything like it before! Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Vogl

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery is crap. After 6 months last an hour. Contacted and got a replacement same issue now won’t respond to emails
customer_reviews.author: rich cripple

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: To big and bulky and one of my headphones didnt work when i recieved it
customer_reviews.author: kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty bad. To me it's well worth paying the extra $60-$100 for earbuds that don't PAIR INDIVIDUALLY. The positive reviews for this HAVE to be fake.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Ear Bud Fail
customer_reviews.text: He left ear bud just quit working; no sound, and no way to reset. They were great while they lasted but just disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wolter

customer_reviews.title: I love these ear buds
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ear buds I have used. Couldn't be happier. I had to return the first set but Anker made it right with just a few emails.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Ochs

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They work great. I like the sound quality, I use them with my phone in the car and do not experience static or external noises
customer_reviews.author: Mary0519

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good value hear wish it could go 10% louder.
customer_reviews.author: Large Lau

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Were great while they lasted, but left earbud completely stopped working after about 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Work very well, stay in ear well
customer_reviews.text: They fit in ear well and stay put. Easy to use and they really block out any outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Pickell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Thease things are awesome I can’t complain they have geat fit and sound great batt life is great to
customer_reviews.author: mark w donegan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfy. Just a tad bulky.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little bulky in the ear but I love everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great (for me) and works well with my phone.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with the Google Pixel 2 XL. It's pretty comfortable. I'm not used to these type of ear buds, but it's not that bad after getting used to them. I really liked the fit of the Apple Ear Pods and didn't think I would like these but I was really sick of the wires. I can't get them to pair with my Linux laptop using Fedora 27 for some reason. It would be nice to figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ronald Kenoyer

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: Ear peaces are very good. Battery case is a little bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Junichi Hayashi

customer_reviews.title: Zolo Earbuds Are Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing. Fits nicely & comfortably. Very high quality for the price. Highly recommended. No hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Dinh Le

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product / Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with this product. I run almost every day with them. They fit well and work well (for the most part). Sometimes the left one losses connection,but it's not been a huge problem. After just a few months, the left one would not hold a charge. I contacted the company and they sent me another set. Pretty impressive. They didn't even ask me to return the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Sound drops out
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware. These do have connectivity problems. I just received these as a gift and the sound does drop out of the left and sometimes the right earpiece. i will be returning these for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my wife. She has smallish ears ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife. She has smallish ears and complains about fit on most earphones, these she likes and uses regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a couple different ones and these are the best I have had. They connect super easy and sound good.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I liked my Jabra Sport earbuds a lot.... But I love these. Better sound and much longer battery life. So far these exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Vining

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Really good product , easy to use , not the best for phones calls but it works , good for gym for light running ( use the right fit for you ) very intuitive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headset. I do not have the issues others have stated about disconnecting on the left earbud. I think there maybe some confusion about the technology. Ture wireless earbuds can only use the right ear bud (master) for phone calls. It will use both for music and other audio.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Reed

customer_reviews.title: Stays connected, clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless headphones I've owned yet. Phone: pixel 2 XL
customer_reviews.author: cakers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit and sound
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this style but decided to try these based on the Anker products ive puchased in the past. Just arrived, the packaging alone gave me high expectations. Great quality in the build,look and feel. I put them in after charging for a few minutes to test them and WOW! Amazing fit and better sound, blew me away. They also seal out the ambient sound. Another great Anker product.
customer_reviews.author: grimmy

customer_reviews.title: This earphone is easy to fit and can insulate most of noise when ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this earbug for the whole last week, it's really a portable one with high sound quality. This earphone is easy to fit and can insulate most of noise when I was on a train. By the way, the battery inside can work for a whole day...That's the most amazing thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Bluetooth earbuds, but constant background noise.
customer_reviews.text: Update 8.21.18 - Anker sent a replacement pair of earbuds. Since I enjoyed my previous pair while they worked, am looking forward to seeing how this second set holds up. Update 8.9.18 - Lost two stars due to right earbud randomly losing its volume over a week ago. Even at max volume, you hear some little as it has become very quiet. Original Review Positives: Good fit and stays in the ear, connects easily, good battery life both on the earbuds and the case, simple controls. Negatives: There is a low constant buzzing in the background (music hides it, but really noticeable during podcasts).
customer_reviews.author: Christian Miller

product_meta.title: Zolo Liberty Total-Wireless Earphones, Bluetooth Earbuds with Graphene Driver Technology and 24 Hours Battery Life, Sweat Resistant Total-Wireless Earbuds with Smart AI
product_meta.description:
Cut The Cord
While most Bluetooth earphones claim to be wireless, they still tie you down with cords. Liberty are truly wireless, with two finely-tuned earpieces offering unrestrained listening and unprecedented convenience.

Immersive Sound
Liberty's revolutionary graphene-coated drivers are rigid, yet light. They produce precision oscillation for superior sound across the entire frequency range. Crystal clarity and a delicately tuned sound signature deliver immersive sound that puts the listener center stage.

Long-Lasting Battery

3.5 hours of playtime is boosted by the powerful charging case for an incredible 24 hours of play time. Power your commute for a week without needing to bring a charging cable with you.

Instant Connection
PUSH AND GOTM makes connecting your devices effortless—take Liberty out of the charging case and connect via your phone's Bluetooth menu. After the initial setup Liberty automatically connects when removed from the case and disconnects when returned. 

Smart Assistant Access
A single tap activates your favorite AI Assistant. Liberty's microphones are optimised for voice recognition, so you'll get the answers you need, fast. 

Find Your Perfect Fit
GripFit technology ensures Liberty fits comfortably, yet securely in your ear. Simply slide in and turn to lock. Personalize your Liberty with the addition of silky smooth liquid silicon EarTips and GripJackets in multiple sizes.

Note
The ZoloLife App is designed for use with Liberty+ Total-Wireless Earphones (it will not work with Liberty). GripFit jackets must be removed when charging Liberty.
feature_bullets: No Wires, No Limits: Total-Wireless Earphones with graphene-enhanced immersive sound.
Graphene-Enhanced Sound: Pioneering audio technology delivers jaw-dropping clarity and treble. A sound-tight seal ensures deep bass and exceptional isolation.
24 Hours of Power: Get 3.5 hours of playtime from a single charge, boosted to 24 with the included charging case.
Simplified Setup: PUSH AND GO ensures ultra-fast pairing, while a single tap activates Smart AI.
What You Get: Liberty Total-Wireless Earphones, Liberty Charging Case, 4 x GripFit Jackets, 3 x EarTips, a Micro-USB Cable, and a 12-month warranty.

specifications.Additional Features: Wireless, Microphone, USB connectivity, Voice activated
